trans-unit.source: Describes the area of the designer that contains the point passed to a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.HitTest*> method.
trans-unit.target: Beskriver området i designer som inneholder punkt som er sendt til en <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.HitTest*>metode.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.HitTest*>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] HitTestLocations is used by <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.HitTest%2A> methods to describe the area of the designer hit by mouse clicks and drag and drop operations.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]HitTestLocations brukes av <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.HitTest%2A>metoder for å beskrive området i designer nådde av museklikk og dra og slipp operasjoner.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.HitTest%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the HitTestLocations to decide what kind of action to take in response to a successful hit test.
trans-unit.target: Velg HitTestLocations for å bestemme hva slags skal gjøre som svar på en vellykket treffprosent test.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the area contained by the expand button was hit.
trans-unit.target: Angir området som utvidelsesknappen inneholder ble oppdaget.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the bottom of the designer was hit.
trans-unit.target: Angir at bunnen av designer ble oppdaget.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that a connector on the designer was hit.
trans-unit.target: Angir at en kobling på designer ble oppdaget.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that any part of the designer was hit.
trans-unit.target: Angir at en del av designer ble oppdaget.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the left part of the designer was hit.
trans-unit.target: Angir at venstre del av designer ble oppdaget.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that no part of the designer was hit.
trans-unit.target: Angir at ingen deler av designer ble oppdaget.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the right part of the designer was hit.
trans-unit.target: Angir den høyre delen av designer ble oppdaget.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the top of the designer was hit.
trans-unit.target: Angir toppen av designer ble oppdaget.
